a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total fertility rate vs. wanted fertility rate, 2021
The total fertility rate summarizes the total number of births a woman would have, if she experienced the birth
rates seen in women of each age group in one particular year across her childbearing years. The wanted fertility
rate is an estimate of what the total fertility rate would be if all unwanted births were avoided, based on survey
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
